## Data import: CSVs

Let's import data using the 'readr' Package.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(haven)
```


``` {r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

```{r}
litters_df
head(litters_df)
```

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r}
view(litters_df)
```


```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

`read_csv` options ..

```{r, eval=FALSE}
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```
